rhyme: A is for Amumu, alone and so blue
B for Bard, with chimes to pursue
C is for Caitlyn, a sheriff so brave
D for Darius, with an axe that he wave
E is for Ezreal, an explorer so bold
F for Fiddlesticks, whose scare never gets old
G is for Garen, in bushes he waits
H for Heimerdinger, with turrets that bait
I is for Irelia, her blades dance with grace
J for Jinx, with a rocket to race
K is for Katarina, who shunpos with flair
L for Lux, whose light fills the air
M is for Morgana, with chains to bind tight
N for Nasus, stacking his might
O is for Orianna, who dances with gears
P for Pyke, lurking in waters of fears
Q is for Qiyana, the empress so proud
R for Rakan, who charms the crowd
S is for Sona, her melodies heal
T for Teemo, with mushrooms to peel
U is for Urgot, a terror to behold
V for Volibear, with strength untold
W is for Warwick, who howls at the moon
X for Xayah, whose feathers will swoon
Y is for Yorick, with ghouls in command
Z for Zoe, through portals she'll land
